Articles.Content:
Radio 4 extra, tomorrow (Saturday) 8am and 3pm. "Walking On The Moon" - commemoration of the first moon landings with Buzz Aldrin. Science, planning, radio transcripts, etc.

Pretty unlikely to mention KSP (!) but probably of interest. Unfortunately, I'll be at work.
Ooooo sounds fun! Defo listening to that!
too bad I'm down in cornwall this weekend - poor reception at the moment.
LOL - so out of 4 of us so far only Random Tank will be able to listen. With luck it'll be on BBC iPlayer afterwards.

Could somebody record this please?

I imagine that it will be on BBC iPlayer Radio; you can get it there probably on Sunday or next week.

LOL - so out of 4 of us so far only Random Tank will be able to listen. With luck it'll be on BBC iPlayer afterwards.

Hehehehe!
Hi folks, I'm going to move this to a more appropriate forum. Let us on the other side of the pond know what you thought of it!
